DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare antidepressant efficacy safety two dos DVS SR ( 25 50 mg/day ) treatment adult Major Depressive Disorder . The study also assess change sexual function general functional quality life outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Desvenlafaxine Succinate Sustained Release ( DVS SR ) Treatment Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Adult , outpatient primary diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( depressive symptom least 30 day prior screen ) Hamilton Psychiatric Rating Scale Depression ( HAMD 17 ) total score > = 20 Clinical Global Impressions ScaleSeverity ( CGIS ) score > = 4 Clinical instability 25 % great increase/decrease HAMD 17 total score screen baseline Significant risk suicide assess clinician judgement , HAMD 17 Columbia SuicideSeverity Rating Scale score Other eligibility criterion also apply
